short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Opens a link at a specified time

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will open a link at any given time, all you have to do is insert a link and choose which time it should open.

This extension is good for people who need to remember something e.g. a meeting, homework or something completely different.
